help-file.title: "GOD, PURGE"
help-file.content:
"Purge" is a way to make the world a little cleaner.
Syntax: purge To empty the room of all monsters and TAKEable objects purge <character> To remove a living thing. Kicks out a player. purge <object> Removes an object, TAKEable or not.
Note: purging a container will also remove everything in it, whereas purging a character will make their equipment drop to the ground.
